page.title: 14 Employment in Cwmbran
page.content:
Cwmbran contains many unit factories that employ staffs of 30 to 40 workers. The major employers are:
Girlings Ltd-who manufacture brakes for cars and commercial vechicles.
Saunders Valve-who manufacture valves for industry.
The number of people unemployed is: 3105 (2186 males 919 females) The number of vacancies available is: 159 The rate of unemployment is: 16.6%
We have found that the majority of working people living in Cwmbran travel elsewhere to their place of work. Compiled by Brookfield
